en: This is a fan-made game of Doki Doki Literature Club, recommended to play the original first.
zh_CN: 本作为《Doki Doki Literature Club》的同人作品，建议先行游玩原作再来体验

en: Official website of the original game:https://ddlc.moe
Left-click and drag to move a member. Right-click to open the menu.
zh_CN: 另外，左键拖拽成员可以移动其位置，右键点击成员可以打开菜单

en: This game is completely free. If anyone profits from it, please contact the developer promptly.
zh_CN: 本作完全免费，如有人牟利，请及时联系开发者
